content.html: This is a childhood friend who asked me to be his best man, so yeah I think I’ve got some social pressures I’m weighing things against here. (And the sunk cost of the flight and hotel.) Do you think we’ll ever not be anxious about this stuff ever again
content.value:
This is a childhood friend who asked me to be his best man, so yeah I think I’ve got some social pressures I’m weighing things against here. (And the sunk cost of the flight and hotel.)

Do you think we’ll ever not be anxious about this stuff ever again
